alert.note: Alert for Eastern St. Joseph; Elkhart; Lagrange; Western St. Joseph (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 19 at 11:10AM EST until November 20 at 7:00AM EST by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Lake effect snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. Patchy areas of blowing snow. * WHERE...Elkhart, Lagrange, and St. Joseph IN Counties. * WHEN...Until 7 AM EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow and heavy snow will significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow totals will be greatest along the Indiana-Michigan state line. Lower snow amounts will be along and south of US Highway 20.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.

area.areaDesc: Eastern St. Joseph; Elkhart; Lagrange; Western St. Joseph
